Title: Restitution
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Fred Golan, Dave Andron, Elmore Leonard (short story "Fire in the Hole")
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Jere Burns, Joelle Carter
Plot: The Mexican cartel catches up with Boyd and demands payback for the dead bodies, Ava goes on the offensive after being accused of snitching, and Wendy faces a hard choice after she learns that Kendal will be tried as an adult.
